import { EventEmitter, Injectable } from '@angular/core';

@Injectable({
  providedIn: 'root'
})
export class ProductsDataService {

  constructor() { }
  productsData: Array<{id: number, img: string, cat: string, title: string, price: string, desc: string, colors: Array<string>, sizes: Array<string>, bestseller: boolean, cart: boolean, size: string, quantity: number}> = [
